description.p: You have made a pact with a pair of patrons, two daggers, fey twins or a two headed mad god. Whatever it may be the two of them ffer up a new style of warlock.

description.p: The Twins lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

sheet.description: The Twins lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell.

description.p: At 1st level, the unusual nature of your patron allows you to be in two places at once. As a bonus action you can create a second instance of yourself, it appears in an unoccupied space that you can see in 30ft of you and lasts for 1 hour. When this effect ends you choose which image fades. Whenever you take any form of action, bonus action or movement you can choose wich instance performs the action. They share the same body, therefore they have the same hit points tacking damage as one, the same equipment and stats. You can use this feature once per long rest.

description.p: At 6th level, you are able to twin your cantrips. Whenever you cast a cantrip, you cast it twice in the same action, bonus action or reaction. Ending the effects of one spell, or if one of them is dispelled or countered they both are.
